1.1.name: wordpress/hellish-simplicity
1.1.description: Hellish Simplicity is a clean simple design. Responsive design makes the theme look good on all devices and the header text can be easily modified via the theme customiser or the themes header admin page. See the theme in action at the authors blog, http://ryanhellyer.net/ or check out the theme documentation at http://geek.ryanhellyer.net/themes/hellish-simplicity/.
